text: You will possibly win 1st time playing and thats it! Eats your money. I'm newish to online gambling and this is just unbelievable. Tried a new site and it's so much better. Avoid!! Always same winner and when you say anything in the chat on bingo you have what I assume is a moderator telling you it's a game of luck and to not put such things about it being the same winners or I'll have to leave the game!+ they was the constant winner. Lol wasn't the only one to notice this as a few said it too.

Always the same winners. My friend told me to check mine and winners ticket numbers it is alot higher just shows the favourites may be marked with different tickets. Reading the reviews now I see I am not the only one. If your new you will win but only once which is what happened to me and a few of my friends. I love bingo but its better to just go to one rather than play a game you dont have a chance of winning online.

Just a money pit!!!! whatever you win you'll have to spend all that to win anything else!!!! all the slots are fixed after you win anything!!!!!! For example i recently won ¬£130 and since then i've not had a single bonus spin on anything!! took the entire lot back!! disgusting the way you treat people considering you make millions on people!!!!!!

I have been playing while and put lots of money in and won pretty much nothing apart from at the start with the bonus money. But had to wager 200 so makes no sense when they allow you to win 200! Same players winning every game so I'm guessing there bots. Of not the game is very unstable on who wins.

Absolutely hated this. Literally the slowest app I've ever used, couldn't join games because as soon as it had loaded it told me it was over . Also not clear on bets prices so I accidentally spent 2 pound on a slot I didnt want to on! Also accidentally quit a bingo game and had no choice to rejoin or check on results. Will delete asap and definitely never recommend.

Made account two weeks ago deposited ¬£10 never got to play yet . It kicked me out of site when I went to sign in again said it wasn't my email . I've done a live chat . With a man that had the worst attitude ever . Sent emails they saying it wasn't the email I joined with yet the live chat . Gentle man says it was basically worse . Experience ever ! Since then have joined virgin bingo which I've had no bother with .

Very Poor, saw the advert on the Chase, thought would give it a go to pass the time away during the lockdown. Entered all my details to join and then soon as I paid my deposit the game locked me out. I then tried to use live chat, first a robot then Passed over to someone live Kim who asked for all my details then totally ignored me. Thanks for wasting my time. Alison then came on who was slightly better and said with me paying my deposit it auto locked me out. Not happy avoid like the plague!

A disgrace put money in no problem but taking it out I'm still trying don't bother signing up unless you got a passport and driving license which not everybody has otherwise useless and customer service there is none all I'm doing is sending documents and getting nowhere an absolute rip off don't download and I'm never using this again

Very disappointed in Gala as of late. I'm up high on Gala rewards with my reward level often being messed-up. I spend well & often. Today for example, playing Sweet Success Megaways. Totally drained my cash time & again offering loads yet giving nothing!! Feel like I've had my pants pulled down & spanked repeatedly. Change needed me thinks....
I played around ¬£50 and returned with about ¬£6 something... All in all, there was never any big wins and the biggest win I had was ¬£1. Never playing this again, absolute waste of money.
Fixed - played games one after the other and I noticed the same player won every game, happened on other game modes as well, waste of money if it's the people winning each time

Love playing bingo love winning more but unfortunately I never seem to get close to a win 50 tickets and still no chance of winning seems to be same winners time time again but their never on chat makes me think it's bots that win ¬£40 week I've deposited and not a penny return using up my last few quid after that I'm deleting the app sick of wasting my money
replyText: Hi Lorraine, thanks for the 5* rating of the Gala Bingo app. Gala Bingo Review Team

text: Rubbish site. Keeps locking me out!! It runs for a while but when you return it says they don't run in my location or country. Contacted customer service but they fobbed me off about caches!!
Alot of glitches and bugs that cost you money if your not careful. My screen froze and 2 minutes later ¬£70 plus gone. Contacted customer services
Lots of variety in terms of games to play, and when I won and cashed out it was very quick going in to bank so I have a good experience using this app compared to the alternatives I've tried before.
Rubbish!!! Thought id play during this isolation. Deposit funds then locked out and have to wait upto 72 hours to resolve. Thanks Gala! Brilliant
Good selection of rooms to play in at various prices for tickets, good prize money and variety of slots to choose from. Good luck peoplesüçÄ
First time playing live with real cash.. it's very hard to get a win, I've also noticed the same names popping up in the winners pool

Awesome best online bingo. Never bet on online before and I can't believe I won, this is the best online bingo, Gala bingo it's the best. Won ¬£200 first time and keep on winning more. Get playing now
I have been playing it for a while now and it's a load of rubbish as I can't win anything even at normal bingo and I didn't even receive my welcome bonus
It's good but would be better if it wasn't the same names most of the time winning on the free games sometimes it really takes the piss x

You will never win.two bonuses one ¬£8 and another ,¬£14???you can not even break what you paid in. Absolute rubbish,pit of money. There is no random pay just rip off . Winning ratio is terrible. Yet they will blame your luck but not their tricks.

Me and the Mrs both set up an account deposited¬£10 to get the ¬£50 bingo bonus ,she got hers and I didn't ,wouldn't of set an account up if I knew I wouldn't get my bonus,only give a 1 star as no option to give no stars
Been fun, not won a great deal but passes time. I like the heart beats game where the numbers are like bubbles u pop
I like bingo but come on you have to win over ¬£200 to get it in your bank account its not good jackpot joy is better
No welcome bonus and now the app wont let me deposit anymore money which is a good thing when been ripped off with welcome bonus
Let's you have a little play and gamble especially while you can't go out but you have to be careful and have a limit
Excellent range of slots to play love the megaways slots especially fishin frenzy. Could do with getting more new games like lil devil and extra chilli
Love it when the winnings come in lots of choices for you to choose and play
It is relaxing to play. And you can play it at any time I enjoy playing.
The worst bingo app wouldn't recommend it to anyone. If I could I'd cancel my account but there's no option

The app itself is not the best but you get through that for the fun of bingo. Stay on there long enough and you realise that no matter how much you spend/buy tickets for a game, the same people keep winning again and again. Not worth the time or effort. Find an app that isn't loaded towards certain 'players'/bots.
Rubbish.. Paid into my account for it to not show, so can't play. .. Reads scam all day long

Don't waste your money. Had this app for a while now and haven't won anything. Yes I know it's a game of chance but I fell for the hype and the advertising. The reality is that you've got to spend 100's, possibly 1000's of pounds in order to win anything. Apps like this should be banned as they feed off the vulnerable, people who think "i'll play just one more game and that's it" but just carry on until the money has gone. Closing my Gala account as it's just not worth it.

Never depositing again, slots are a scam. Never win more than a few pence.

Ive probably put well over ¬£200 in this and the most ive ever won is ¬£30 and that was when i first joined. i kept depositing thinking it would give out and I ve never had any luck. Apart from that the most ive probably won is ¬£2.40 you do not even break even on any of the games. You literally never win and theres never any decent promotions so youre basically wasting your money. Definetly going to go to sky vegas instead. Least they have some half decent promotions.
Very gd site really gd winning rate and the paying out is really fast xx
Brilliant never played before just getting the hang of things
Find it difficult to navigate

been playing for over a year and have had few wins but always seems to be the same person winning in one game yeh I understand its the luck of the draw but just find it unfair the same person wins.......years ago was on another bingo site and won a lot and sometimes good winnings but this site has high wins but I never seem to win even the slots you dont win on unhappy unhappy

Downloaded the app, signed up and deposited ¬£10 - as far as it got before it crashed and refused to re-open. Funny how it works right up until they get their money then all of a sudden the app doesn't work anymore.
